clinical_history: Patient with neurological deficits referred for brain PET-CT.
findings: Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in right lung upper lobe, suggestive of malignancy.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
recommendations: Clinical correlation recommended with prior imaging.
